name: HUNGRY HANDS (Baileyfit)
description:
Hungry Hands is a quick game I made during my holidays to try and keep in practice with all the skill I had learn't1920 over the last trimester of uni. It's is based of hungry hungry hippos, your goal is to collect more balls then the other player. 

Controls:

Player 1:  W,A,S,D   

Player 2: Arrow Keys 

Menus are controlled with the mouse.
